node.html:
Built an enterprise sales analytics dashboard that reduced reporting time by 35% through automated refresh workflows and streamlined reporting.

Highlights:

  • Revenue, profitability, and customer segmentation analysis
  • Time intelligence measures and KPI reporting
  • SQL-backed model with reliable refresh and validation checks

frontmatter.title: Python ETL Pipeline – Customer & Sales Data

node.html:
Developed a production-style ETL pipeline to clean, validate, and integrate messy customer and sales datasets into analytics-ready outputs for downstream BI.

Highlights:

  • Automated cleaning, standardization, and validation rules
  • Fact–dimension join (sales + customer) with enrichment
  • Generated clean tables and summary outputs for reporting

frontmatter.title: FHIR Bulk Data Ingestion Pipeline (MongoDB + Python)

node.html:
Implemented a scalable ingestion pipeline to load bulk FHIR NDJSON healthcare datasets into MongoDB across multiple resource collections for clinical analytics.

Highlights:

  • Modular ingestion utilities per resource type
  • Preserved FHIR structure for interoperability and downstream CDS use
  • Validated ingested collections using MongoDB Compass and notebooks

frontmatter.title: Clinical Research Data Analysis – Smartphone-Based Semen Assessment

node.html:
Contributed to a peer-reviewed clinical research study evaluating smartphone-based semen analysis under real-world conditions, comparing remote assessments with laboratory-based CASA measurements.

Highlights:

  • Analyzed agreement, reproducibility, and diagnostic performance across remote and laboratory-based measurements
  • Worked with clinical datasets involving sperm concentration, motility, and related quality metrics
  • Findings support smartphone-based systems as scalable tools for population-level research and clinical screening
